attributes.action: Waive student loans for student medics helping to fight Covid-19
attributes.additional_details:
Student medics are putting themselves in potential harms way to help support the NHS in its fight to protect the public against Covid-19.
It is only right that the general public, via its government, recognise their efforts in a tangible and effective way by cancelling out their student debt.
attributes.background: Recognise the efforts of student medics working on the NHS frontline by waiving their student loans.
